description: This file sets up and demonstrates the usage of an Agent with BaiduSearchTools for performing search queries and printing responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing a search agent that utilizes various tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: BaiduSearchTools
classes.description: A class providing search functionalities using Baidu.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the agent's response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
